channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ND
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ND

item.title: Report X-2023061465
item.description:
Report X-2023061465

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-19T21:09:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-05-15
  • City: FARGO
  • State: ND
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: I saw the hazmat on the dock and picked it up, saw it was wet and inspected it with PPE DescribePack: 2 corners (top and bottom) of a side were wet DurationRel: 24 and MitigateEffect: rapped up in hazmat bag and placed in drum
